summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Proposal Builder app after ClauseSelector infinite loop fix. Backend APIs are fully functional (12/12 tests passed) including AI proposal generation with GPT-5.2. Most frontend features work correctly, but AI proposal generation frontend flow has a critical timeout/redirect issue preventing complete end-to-end proposal creation.

integration_issues.issue: Frontend AI generation flow times out after 30+ seconds and fails to redirect to generated proposal detail page, leaving user on Create Proposal page

design_issues.issue: Export functionality not found on proposal detail pages

passed_tests: Backend stats endpoint with correct data (3 proposals)
Backend AI proposal generation (GPT-5.2) - 10,373 characters generated
Dashboard stats cards showing correct values (3 total, 2 in progress, 0 accepted, 1 sent)
Dashboard proposal cards displaying all 3 proposals correctly
Dashboard filter tabs (All, Draft, Pending Review, Sent, Accepted, Rejected)
Proposal detail page loading and display
Navigation between Dashboard, Create Proposal, and Clause Library
Clause Library loading and display (6 default clauses)
ClauseSelector component (infinite loop issue fixed from iteration 2)
Create Proposal form inputs (all fields working)

success_percentage.frontend: 90% (Most features work, AI generation frontend flow has timeout issue)

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix AI proposal generation frontend timeout/redirect issue. Backend AI generation works perfectly (confirmed via direct API testing), but frontend flow fails to complete redirect after generation. Investigation needed: 1) Frontend timeout handling in AI generation flow, 2) Error handling for long-running AI requests, 3) Redirect logic after successful generation. Also add Export functionality to proposal detail pages.
